title: OpenSearch on Helm
description: A step-by-step guide to installing OpenSearch using Helm.

steps.description: This command adds the official OpenSearch Helm chart repository to your Helm configuration.

steps.text: Update your Helm repositories to fetch the latest charts.
steps.description: This ensures that you have the most recent information about the available charts, including the latest OpenSearch versions.
Replace <YOUR_STRONG_PASSWORD> with a strong password for the OpenSearch initial admin user. This command installs OpenSearch with a release name of my-opensearch.
